content: Hello, Cleric! What is your name? Do you ever want to leave your bridge and explore the world?

I am called Mudstone. It is not a name I chose — it is a name the damp and the dark chose for me, and I have not argued with it.

As for leaving the bridge — why would I? Every soul who wants to go somewhere must cross here first. The world does not wait beyond the bridge. The world walks across it. You are proof enough of that.

But I will ask you the same courtesy you asked me: what is your name, and what brings you to this crossing?
